components.html: **Lyrics to the song you play when you {when} when a coffee**
**Lyrics to the song you play when you {other_text} with a coffee**
**Verse**

There's a loving in your eyes all the way \
If I listen to your lies, would you say \
I'm a man (a man) without conviction \
I'm a man (a man) who doesn't know \
How to sell (to sell) a contradiction \
You come and go, you come and go

Clock strikes upon the hour \
And the sun begins to fade \
Still enough time to figure out \
How to chase my blues away \
I've done alright up to now \
It's the light of day that shows me how \
And when the night falls, loneliness calls

If you see a faded sign at the side of the road that says \
Fifteen miles to the, love shack, love shack yeah \
I'm headin' down the Atlanta highway \
Lookin' for the love getaway \
Headed for the love getaway, love getaway \
I got me a car, it's as big as a whale \
And we're headin' on down to the love shack \
I got me a Chrysler, it seats about twenty \
So hurry up and bring your jukebox money

Won't you come see about me? \
I'll be alone, dancing, you know it, baby  \
Tell me your troubles and doubts \
Give them everything, inside and out and \
Love's strange, so real in the dark \
Think of the tender things that we were working on \
Slow change may pull us apart \
When the light gets into your heart, baby
**Chorus**

Oh, I wanna dance with somebody \
I wanna feel the heat with somebody \
Yeah, I wanna dance with somebody \
With somebody who loves me \
Oh, I wanna dance with somebody \
I wanna feel the heat with somebody \
Yeah, I wanna dance with somebody \
With somebody who loves me

Wake me up before you go-go \
Don't leave me hanging on like a yo-yo \
Wake me up before you go-go \
I don't want to miss it when you hit that high \
Wake me up before you go-go \
Cause I'm not plannin' on going solo \
Wake me up before you go-go \
Take me dancing tonight \
I wanna hit that high (yeah, yeah)

Woah, we're half way there \
Woah, livin' on a prayer \
Take my hand, we'll make it I swear \
Woah, livin' on a prayer

All night long (all night), All night (all night) \
All night long (all night), All night (all night) \
All night long (all night), All night (all night) \
All night long! (all night), Ooh, yeah (all night)
**Verse**

They're Out To Get You, Better Leave While You Can \
Don't Wanna Be A Boy, You Wanna Be A Man \
You Wanna Stay Alive, Better Do What You Can \
So Beat It, Just Beat It 

You Have To Show Them That You're Really Not Scared \
You're Playin' With Your Life, This Ain't No Truth Or Dare \
They'll Kick You, Then They Beat You, \
Then They'll Tell You It's Fair \
So Beat It, But You Wanna Be Bad

The wild dogs cry out in the night \
As they grow restless, longing for some solitary company \
I know that I must do what's right \
As sure as Kilimanjaro rises like Olympus above the Serengeti \
I seek to cure what's deep inside, frightened of this thing that I've become

People dancing all in the street \
See the rhythm all in their feet \
Life is good, wild and sweet \
Let the music play on...(Play on, play on, play on...) \
Feel it in your heart and feel it in your soul \
Let the music take control \
We're going to Party, Liming, Fiesta, forever \
Come on and sing along \
We're going to Party, Liming, Fiesta, forever \
Come on and sing my song!

Some boys romance \
Some boys slow dance \
That's all right with me \
If they can't raise my interest then I \
Have to let them be \
Some boys try and some boys lie but \
I don't let them play (no way) \
Only boys who save their pennies \
Make my rainy day
